title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point for naming each of the following (2 points maximum):

(a) the Sibyl; Deiphobe, guide to Underworld, (priestess); Apollo speaking through Sibyl

(b) Aeneas
descriptions:
Student correctly identifies the answer to either a or b:

(a) the Sibyl; Deiphobe, guide to Underworld, (priestess); Apollo speaking through Sibyl

(b) Aeneas

Student correctly identifies the answer to a AND b:

(a) the Sibyl; Deiphobe, guide to Underworld, (priestess); Apollo speaking through Sibyl

(b) Aeneas
